about_the_game: The Original superchill Dorfromantik Soundtrack by Laryssa Okada (Manifold Garden OST) and Pygoscelis. Inspired by the warm and nostalgic memories of a childhood spent between city and countryside, these soothing and relaxing tracks created from a wide arrangement of different instruments and musical styles will take you on a peaceful but nonetheless dynamic journey through joyful soundscapes.
detailed_description: The Original superchill Dorfromantik Soundtrack by Laryssa Okada (Manifold Garden OST) and Pygoscelis. Inspired by the warm and nostalgic memories of a childhood spent between city and countryside, these soothing and relaxing tracks created from a wide arrangement of different instruments and musical styles will take you on a peaceful but nonetheless dynamic journey through joyful soundscapes.
name: Dorfromantik Soundtrack Vol.1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 72 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 424 MB available space
